inn1.comm: pitches on legs and Cook goes back and flicks it to deep backward square for first runs
a widish outswinger to start off against the right hander
a touch in but still wide of the crease, goes away from the batsman, left alone by Bell
fuller length closer to the stumps, swings away a touch, Bell comes half forward and plays it with an open face down to third man
pitches on short of length outside leg and then curves away, Cook defends on the back foot
and he gets it perfect this time, draws batsman forward with a length ball, and then moves it away from Cook's forward prod
loses direction as he bowls this wide of off, it swings further away from Cook
not much bounce on this length ball pitched outside off, left alone by the batsman
length ball, pitches on off and goes straight on with the angle, hits the pads as Bell plays for the swing, the bowler appeals but that was probably missing leg
132 kph, bowls a fuller length but it goes down the leg side and is called a wide
short of length on off stump, not much movement this time, defended to off side off the back foot
lures Bell with a fuller ball on off stump, gets some away movement too. Bell doesn't come fully forward and outside edges the ball down to third-man
fuller delivery wide outside off to the left-hander, Cook watches it go all the way to the keeper
short of length on off stump line, defended to point off the back foot
length ball, pitches outside off and goes away with the angle, left alone by Cook
short of length outside off, Bell stays on the back foot and defends it to cover
another back of length delivery, straightens after pitching outside off, defended off the back foot again
pushes it a bit further up, but it is wide outside off and Bell shoulders arms
in the channel outside off, straightens a touch, Bell comes forward and then lets it go
keeps persisting with that wide line outside off, it moves away after pitching too. Bell leaves it alone
length ball, closer to the off stump line, Bell stays on the back foot and covers the movement as he defends it to point
136 kph, short of length on the middle, comes in a bit quicker on to Cook who is unable to get it away on the leg side. The inside edge hits the pads
another short of length delivery on off stump, Cook tries to cut it, but that comes quickly on to him and he manages to dab it to point
attempts a fuller length delivery on off but Cook responds with a gentle push through covers for a beautifully timed boundary
short of length outside off, Cook flashes at it but it goes just past the top-edge to the keeper
back of length on off and middle, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
length ball outside off, Cook stays in the crease and cracks it towards cover, but it goes straight to the fielder

it is that big inswinger that Bhuvi has been dishing out recently. It hits the pads and everyone goes up in appeal, but that hit him just outside the line of off, and would have probably gone over the stumps
bowls one that leaves Cook after pitching on short of length, left alone
pitches outside leg and Cook gets beaten by the late away movement
length ball outside off, Cook stays in the crease and cuts it straight to point
fuller ball on the pads, appeared to be a touch slower. Cook tries to flick it on the on side but gets a leading edge towards point
length ball on the pads again, Cook doesn't get any bat on it and the ball rolls to the right of the wicketkeeper
fuller length on off stump, Cook is slow to come forward but manages to drive it to the left of mid-on
it wasn't a short delivery, and it was outside off, but Cook stays back and pulls it over midwicket for the second boundary of the innings
length ball just outside off, well-judged by Cook who leaves it after spotting the line
he comes forward and times this through cover handsomely, not much effort by Cook in that shot but it speeds through the outfield
short of length outside off, punched to point off the back foot
how did that get to the boundary! It appeared to be just a defensive push towards the leg side, but it splits the gap between mid-on and midwicket and races to the boundary easily
now Bell joins in and flicks a length delivery on his pads to the deep backward square leg boundary
length ball wide outside off, just goes inside the wide-marker. Bell leaves it alone
gets width with a length delivery, Bell stays in the crease and plays a well-timed square drive to the boundary
comes in to the batsman after pitching short of length, Bell tries to play it to the on side but gets a leading edge to the off
in the channel outside off, left alone easily
beats him with one that comes in with the angle and leaves him after pitching outside off stump
short of length outside off, cuts away from Cook who hangs his bat at that one and is lucky not to get an edge
fuller length outside off, goes straight on with the angle, left alone by Cook
short of length outside off, Cook stays on the back foot and steers the ball to third-man
good bounce for Ishant. It was pitched wide outside off, goes straight on, left alone by Bell
length ball outside off, no movement for Ishant, Bell comes forward and after covering the line of the ball, leaves it alone
fuller length ball on off stump, and the big inside edge saves Bell as he tries to drive it from the crease
short of length outside off, Cook cuts it hard and Raina at short cover point makes an important stop
on the pads and Cook punches it to the left of midwicket, is unable to beat the fielder
this one cuts the batsman in half. It pitches on off stump and comes in to Cook who was looking to cut it
fuller delivery and Cook has been dispatching them easily. He does it again as he drives it with through cover for another boundary
length ball, pitched on leg stump and cuts away a bit, defended from the crease
short of length on off stump, Cook stands tall and punches it to the left of mid-off
short of length outside off, Bell stays out of line and lets it go through to the keeper
beats him with a length ball on off stump. It came in with the angle and leaves the batsman after pitching.
in the channel outside off, left alone easily

caught at third-man! Oh there comes a wicket! Bell, from nowhere, decides to give Ishant a charge and tries to hit it straight down the ground. But he doesn't really get to the pitch of the ball and it takes a healthy top-edge that goes high towards third-man where Bhuvi takes a well-judged catch
fuller length delivery wide outside off, Cook doesn't bother with those ones, leaves it alone
closer to the off stump line, Cook sees the length and the line and lets it go through
short of length delivery, gets up on the batsman, who gets beaten. Dhoni is unable to collect it cleanly
length ball, pitches on the middle and comes in a touch into the batsman, Cook stays on the crease and blocks it down the pitch
length ball outside off, moves away like a frisbee, left alone
short of length on the pads, Cook covers the movement and punches it past midwicket. Pujara (the sub) runs around from deep square leg to cut it off
back of length on off, punched to mid-off off the back foot
another shot with not much flamboyance, but a lot of control. It was a fuller delivery on the middle stump and Cook just times it down the ground for a boundary.
short of length wide outside off, KP lets it go through

hits him on his thigh region ! KP in some pain immediately. The ball pitched on short of length outside off, but cut back sharply into the batsman. KP gets an inside edge and gets hit where it hurts the most
length ball outside off, goes straight on to the keeper. KP watches it go with expectant eyes.

how close was that! It was a fuller delivery outside off, it cut back into the batsman and hit him just outside the line of off. A good decision in the end. Ishant looked sure. Raina attempts a run out from second slip but gives away overthrows. KP tried to get into the crease with his hand and not his bat. Unsual. But effective
short of length ball on off stump, defended off the back foot
now beats him with a length ball outside off which leaves the batsman after pitching.
133 kph, back of length delivery on off, defended off the back foot
fuller length delivery on the stumps, driven down to mid-off
goes back to this short of length delivery on the pads and turns it to square leg for a single
fuller delivery outside off, defended off the front foot
length ball wide outside off, KP thinks about going after it but curbs his enthusiasm
short of length delivery outside off, punched on the up to mid-off
back of length outside off, defended towards cover off the back foot
was that a good leave or a midjudgement! The ball pitches on middle and off and cuts back into the batsman, who leaves it alone. It just goes over the top of off
this one goes on straight with the angle, left alone easily
short of length on the pads, Cook stays on the back foot and flicks it fine on the leg side. The fielder was square and he had no chance to cut it off
short of length delivery outside off, left alone. It carries quite nicely to the keeper
pushed a touch further up, but it is left alone again by the batsman
back of length delivery on off stump, KP stays right behind it and defends to the off
short of length outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
fuller delivery on off, 133 kph,  the batsman doesn't come fully forward and gets an inside edge towards square leg
beats him with one that leaves the batsman after pitching. KP, who is being forced to remain in the crease with the keeper standing up, hangs his bat at that one
another accurate delivery in the channel, defended towards cover off the back foot
length ball closer to the off stump line, pushed to cover off the front foot
starts off after drinks with another accurate delivery on the stumps, Cook defends it back to the bowler
length ball on off, Cook chooses to stay on the back foot and defends it to mid-off
he stays rooted inside the crease to this short of length delivery and gets beaten as the ball leaves him after pitching.
fuller length delivery on off, Cook takes a small step forward and punches it to mid-on
another one that beats the batsman outside off. It pitches on a length around middle stump and leaves the batsman after pitching. Cook wasn't sure whether to go forward or back
down the leg side and is called a wide
short ball and Cook reads the length quickly and swivels to play a cracking pull through deep square leg for a boundary
starts off with a length ball on off stump, KP gets behind the line of the ball and defends it solidly back to the bowler
in the channel outside off, moves a touch away after pitching. KP comes forward and then shoulders arms
he gets beaten outside off with one that cuts away from him after pitching on length outside off
and another one. He stays in the crease and tries to play the length ball outside off away from his body, gets beaten
now he brings it into the batsman. It is a short of length delivery on the middle stump, cuts into the batsman and he gets hit high on the thigh pads
flicks it from outside off to deep square leg. That is more like the KP we know
flighted delivery outside off, KP cuts it to deep point and scampers back for a second
flatter delivery outside off, no turn yet. Pushed to cover for a single
fuller length delivery on off stump, Cook comes forward in defence
pushed through on off, Cook stays back and works it away towards midwicket
that was a powerful back foot punch but Rohit Sharma makes a good diving stop at cover
flighted outside off, KP comes forward and pushes it down the ground towards long-on
short of length outside off, KP goes back and attempts a back foot punch, but it hits the inside half and goes towards the right of mid-on
keeps it tight on off stump line, defended by Cook off the back foot
fuller length delivery on off stump, Cook comes forward positively in defence, gets a bit of inside edge as he plays that towards mid-on
short of length and on the pads, Cook stays back and just glances it fine to the boundary.
gets it back on the off stump line. Cook defends it off the back foot
length ball on the middle, the batsman comes forward and plays it towards midwicket from the inside half of his bat
pushed through on the pads, Cook stays back and turns it to deep square leg
flatter delivery on the middle, KP looks more confident now as he stylishly drives it to deep midwicket
quicker delivery on the middle stump line, punched to midwicket off the back foot
flighted on off, Cook comes forward and pushes it to long on for a single
flighted and slower, outside off, KP takes a big stride and places it in the gap at cover for a single
drifts on to the pads, the batsman takes a forward stride and glances it to the right of short fine leg
back of length outside off, Cook stays back and pushes it back to the bowler.
now beats the batsman with a short of length delivery which cuts away from Cook after pitching
short of length on the middle stump, the batsman stays back and plays it off his hips to deep backward square
132 kph, length ball outside off, KP stays patient, defends
short of length outside off, KP drives it on the up, without much timing, to the left of mid-off and takes a quick single
appeal for lbw. Cook plays outside the line of a length delivery, but that didn't come back enough
flatter delivery on the middle stump, worked around towards backward square for a single
drifts on to the pads and Cook, who is forward, dabs it towards square leg
flighted delivery and full on the middle, driven hard down the ground. More of a KP shot and long on had no chance to cut that off
spins in to the batsman, who punches that hard to off, but can't beat cover
flighted outside off, KP comes forward and turns it to midwicket for a single
full and down the leg side, Cook tries to paddle but is not able to get it past the fielder at short fine leg
133.6 kph, short of length delivery on off stump, comes in a touch into Cook who defends it towards cover off the back foot
on the middle stump line, Cook pushes it to the left of midwicket to bring up his fifty
short of length outside off, KP tries to push it to cover but gets an inside edge to fine leg
back of length on off, Cook stays on the back foot and punches it to mid-on for a single
fuller delivery on off stump, KP comes forward and drives it to mid-on
comes in sharply after pitching, but KP defends it down the ground after watching it carefully
flighted delivery on off stump, Cook comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
flatter outside off and Cook gets beaten as he stays on the back foot trying to steer the ball towards point, Dhoni fails to collect cleanly
flighted on the off, pushed to cover point of the front foot
more air outside off, Cook pushes it to extra cover off the front foot
goes down on his knee to play a sweep, but places it to the left of short fine leg
flatter delivery on off, KP goes back and punches it down the ground to long on
bowls flat on the pads, driven to deep midwicket
flatter outside off, Cook just dabs it on the on side and takes off for a quick single
on the pads to KP, the batsman comes forward and places it to the right of midwicket
pushed through on off stump, Cook comes forward and pushes it to midwicket

fuller and flighted outside off and Cook goes down on his knee quickly as he plays a powerful sweep to deep square leg. Rahane made a good diving stop at the boundary, but his hand was touching the rope
beats him with one that goes straight on. Cook was playing for the turn
flatter delivery on off stump, KP stays back and punches it past the non-striker to long-on
gets some turn outside off, but it was short and Cook smashes it hard through cover for a boundary. There was no one in the deep to cut it off
flighted on off, Cook comes forward in defence
more front foot defence, this time played towards cover
spots the length early and goes back to cut it hard past point for another boundary
flighted on the middle stump, Cook comes forward and defends that to the leg side
flatter delivery on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to long on
quicker delivery outside off, Cook goes for a sweep but misses. The ball hits the pads and rolls towards the off side
flighted on the pads, KP tries to drive it through on but gets a leading edge back to the bowler
comes down now, but Jadeja pitches it short and hits the pads
quicker delivery and hits KP on the pads, but was going down the leg side
flighted outside off, hits the inside half of KP's bat as he comes forward in defence, goes towards midwicket
flighted on off, pushed back to the bowler
more flight by the bowler, the batsman comes forward and drives to mid-off
shorter delivery and Cook goes for a pull but is not able to find the gap, hits it to deep midwicket
KP comes down the wicket and drives the quicker delivery to deep midwicket, where Ishant makes a mess of it. He was behind the ball, but it went through his legs to the boundary
comes forward to this flighted delivery and drives it to long on for a single
pushed to midwicket off a flatter delivery
pushes this one through on the stumps, but the shorter length allows KP to go back and cut it to deep point
quicker on the middle stump, the batsman plays it from the crease to midwicket
fuller delivery outside off and Cook goes for a sweep shot, but Kohli at short fine makes a good stop
some turn finally for Jadeja and he beats KP with that one as the batsman reaches out to meet the ball
pushed to the off side off the front foot for a single
quicker delivery on off, punched back to the bowler
he jumps out of the crease and plays this flat delivery on the pads in the air towards long on
short and on the pads, Cook waits and pulls it behind square for a couple of runs
flighted on the middle stump, Cook comes forward and places it towards square leg for a single
pushed through on the middle and leg, KP waits and defends it to the leg side
flatter delivery outside off, comes a bit a quicker, pushed back to the bowler
flighted on off, KP pushes it towards the non-striker, but Ashwin makes a good diving stop
he goes for a premeditated sweep from outside off and gets a top-edge but fortunately for him, it drops safely in front of deep backward square leg
flatter delivery outside off, KP goes back and punches it to deep cover
flighted on off stump, Cook defends it off the front foot towards midwicket
now Cook comes down the track, but Jadeja bowls it quicker and Cook manages to just chip it in the air towards long-on.
fuller delivery, it is driven hard towards midwicket where the fielder makes a half-stop
punched off the back foot to long-off
pushed through on the middle, punched off the back foot to long on
on the pads and Cook glances it fine, but Jadeja at short fine leg cuts it off
flighted outside  leg stump and Cook gets on top of that, sweeps it fine past short fine leg for a boundary
short ball outside off, cut hard towards point where Ishant makes a diving stop to prevent runs

quicker delivery, wraps Cook on the pads and he is given out. Cook can consider himself unlucky as that pitched comfortably outside the leg stump line.  It didn't turn as much as he expected, played outside the line and was hit in the front of the middle stump. But that's a bad decision by the umpire.
flighted outside off and Morgan goes for the sweep straightaway but misses and is hit on the pads
he stays back and punches the ball to long-off
turns into Morgan after pitching outside off, the batsman comes forward and dabs it towards the leg side
defended to midwicket off a flatter delivery
goes back spotting the length is a little short, pushes it to long off for a single
played towards covers off one wide outside off
quicker delivery on the off stump, the batsman drops it towards cover and sets off for a quick single
flatter delivery outside off, KP waits on the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
flighted on off, KP comes forward to drive it towards the leg side, plays it straight to midwicket
turns this one from middle towards square leg for a single
flatter delivery, Morgan tries to cut it late but plays it straight down to short third man

caught at long-on! A nothing shot from Morgan! It was a fuller ball and he tries to chip it over mid-on but gets a leading edge. Yuvraj has all the time to run a few paces backwards and take a comfortable catch. From nowhere, India has two wickets now.
flat and quick on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
pushed further up to the batsman, he defends it on the front foot
defended towards cover off the front foot
pushed back to the bowler, and Jadeja makes a diving stop
defended towards cover off the front foot
stays in the crease and defends it back to the bowler
plays this short of length delivery outside off on the up, straight to mid-off
decides to charge and play the length delivery wide of off towards leg side, misses completely
length ball with some width, this time he stays in the crease and square drives it to deep cover for a single
another loose shot and he gets beaten by the ball that came in to him and goes over the top of the middle.
length ball on off, KP tries to play it to off without feet movement but inside edges it to midwicket
stays on the back foot and steers this delivery outside off to third-man
pushed up to the batsman, Samit defends off the front foot
dabs it to the off side and thinks of a single, but is sent back
flighted delivery on the middle and leg, and of all the places he could have driven this to, Samit drives it straight back to the bowler who accepts the catch gleefully.
goes forward in defence to a full delivery
flatter delivery on off, Root takes a positive stride to place it towards off side
spots the length and goes back immediately, defends it to off side
length ball wide outside off, KP drives it on the up, but gets a toe-end towards cover
short of length outside off, KP goes for a drive on the up but outside edges it to third-man

dropped at first slip by Virat! The fielder was just moved in before the ball. Root played a loose drive and edged it to the left of Kohli, who decides to go with one hand rather than two and drops it.
beats him now with a short of length delivery outside off. Root didn't cover the line of the ball completely
length ball outside off, Root comes forward and outside-edges it to third-man
he pulls out a special, but just for a single. It was a full ball outside off and KP plays a wristy drive that is well timed too. But he is unable to beat mid-on
gets some width with this flatter one, and drives it hard towards cover where Raina makes a half-stop
on the middle stump line, Root spots that and sweeps it fine to deep backward square leg boundary
front foot defence by the batsman this time
flatter delivery on off, defended back to the bowler
pushed up to the batsman who comes forward and drives it to cover
quicker and shorter, on the stumps, Root stays back and defends it. The ball stays a touch low
he is getting consistent seam movement today. This one cuts away from a length outside off and beats KP as he tries to drive it to the on side
fuller length, driven to mid-on, Raina has a shy at the stumps, he hits but the ball ricochets to the off side allowing a single
length ball on off stump, Root watches that closely and defends it towards point
length ball on off, Root gets solidly behind that one to play it towards cover
fuller length but Root gets some width this time, he comes forward and drives it to deep point for a couple
fuller length, angling in to the batsman, Root drives it straight to midwicket
pushed through on the pads, KP waits on the back foot and turns it to deep square leg for a single
gives it some air, but it is honing on the leg line, Root drives it towards deep midwicket
an appeal for lbw as Raina fires this one in on the leg stump. KP tried to smear it to square leg, and gets hit on the pads, it was missing leg easily
attempts a reverse sweep but is unable to make a connection
gets it right this time, but his reverse sweep goes to the right of short third man and Ishant makes a good stop
on the middle stump, driven to midwicket
it was a length ball outside off, but Root took a couple of steps forward to get to the pitch, drives it beautifully through the gap at extra cover
length ball outside off, defended towards point off the front foot
short of length outside off, Root goes right back to defend that to the off side
another short of length delivery outside off, Root opens the face and plays it past point for a couple easily
length ball outside off, Root comes forward a touch early and inside edges the ball on to his pads
fuller length delivery on the off, it is driven hard to mid-on and the batsmen set off for a single. Raina takes ages to get rid of the ball, otherwise it could have been interesting
he comes down to the track to this flatter delivery on the middle and leg, pushes is to long-on
fires this one down the leg side as he sees KP jump out, but KP manages to stick his left leg out to get some pad on it and deflect the ball
quicker delivery on off, driven back to the bowler
shorter length delivery outside off, KP tries to open the face to play it towards covers but the ball takes an outside edge and runs down to the boundary
fuller delivery, he takes a step down the pitch and drives it hard to long-off

bludgeons this one past mid-off, it was short of length wide outside off and he throws a hammer at that one. Ishant tries to stop that one, but it just bounces before him and runs down to the boundary
similar delivery, he plays a similar shot but with less timing. The mid-off has been pushed to long-off
fuller delivery on off stump, Root shovels it to the leg side for a single
he tries the tennis forehand now off a short delivery and the ball takes a top edge, falls safely between mid-on and deep midwicket
waits in the crease for this length ball outside off and opens the face to run it down to third man
fuller length delivery, he moves his front foot out and smashes it past mid-on for another boundary.
flighted delivery on off stump and Root picks it up from there and sends it flying over the deep midwicket boundary for the first six of the match
flighted on the pads, he pushes it to midwicket off the front foot
on the middle and leg line, Root quickly readies himself for the sweep and places it fine to deep backward square leg
gets a short ball outside off  and he takes full advantage, punches it hard through cover for another boundary
flighted delivery on off stump, driven to deep midwicket for a single
the mid-off was up and Ashwin's paused delivery is sent over the fielder for yet another boundary. This time by KP
he gets a full delivery and obliges by playing a scoop shot over the short fine fielder for more runs
good yorker aimed at the middle stump, Root blocks it out towards the off side and takes a single
gets a half-volley and smashes it over the infield to send this down to the extra-cover boundary
BOOM!! length or no length, it was going out! Sends this one into the crowd with a muscular hit to deep midwicket

gets his yorker right finally and takes out the middle stump. Not much emotion from the bowler. KP was looking for hitting it over the cover boundary and was in no mood to block. He misses and loses his wicket.
length ball on off and the batsman drops it towards point off the back foot and takes a single
fuller delivery on the middle stump, the batsman drives it to long off for a single
length on the middle stump, Root shovels it to the leg side but can't beat midwicket
Raina drops a dolly! Root went for another shovel shot and got a top-edge that went tamely towards Raina, who got under it. The ball just popped out in the end.
goes off the pads to square leg region
flat and straight, driven back to the bowler
defended back to the bowler off the front foot
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman is unable to get it away and plays it back to the bowler
yorker on the leg stump, the batsman blocks it out to mid-on
how well was that played. Root turns around and plays a reverse scoop to a low full-toss, through third-man
attempts the shot again, but is not able to get under it completely as it is a slower ball, plays it to short third man ans the batsmen scamper for a single
driven to deep midwicket off a length delivery on the pads
comes down the track and turns Ishant's attempted yorker to a low full-toss, but is unable to take advantage as he  plays it straight to square leg
makes room by moving outside leg and smashes this flat delivery over the sight screen.
does that again, sends it over midwicket this time as Jadeja had followed him with that ball

caught at point! Third time unlucky. He makes room again, but instead of following him, the bowler fires it wide outside off. Buttler had to stretch to get to the ball and in the end, he manages a tame top-edge to the fielder at point
quicker delivery wide outside off, Bresnan hits it hard but straight to extra cover

caught at point! Another one for Jadeja. It was a flatter, quicker delivery outside off and Bresnan went for a cut, he got a top-edge and the ball floats to the hands of the point fielder, much in the same way as Buttler a while ago
fuller delivery on the pads from over the wicket, it is driven down to long-on
makes room by moving outside leg and smashes the length ball over the infield to deep cover
he gets to his fifty with a boundary. He came down the track and pulled this short delivery to deep square leg
he charges down the track and hits it past the bowler for yet another boundary
he bowls a good yorker which is blocked back to him, he gathers the ball and has a shy at the non-strikers, but misses and allows an overthrow
he makes room by moving outside leg and crunches this length delivery past point for more runs, goes all the way to the boundary
bowls a good yorker, which the batsman misses but runs for byes anyway

inn2.comm: bowls it wide outside off, it cuts away further after pitching
bowls it short of length outside off, goes away further after pitching, Gambhir leaves it alone
short of length, still wide of off, and Gambhir attempts a half-hearted cut shot, but the extra bounce takes the ball past the edge
fuller delivery outside off, Gambhir doesn't really come forward but drives the ball straight to cover off nonetheless
bowls on the stumps now, and Gambhir closes the face of the bat as he defends it on the jump, it drops close to the stumps
length ball on off stump and Gambhir comes half-forward, and drives the ball straight down the ground for the opening runs
short of length on off stump, defended to cover off the back foot
short of length delivery on off stump, Rohit stands tall and defends it back to the bowler
back of length, straightens a bit after pitching, defended back to the bowler
length ball on the pads, Rohit stays in the crease and turns it to square leg
that was not that short at all, but it was coming in to his body and at the  right height to play a pull, he gets it over the infield to the deep midwicket boundary
length ball outside off, the batsman plays away from his body to guide it to third-man
length ball on off, Gambhir stays behind the line and defends it to off side
length ball on off, cuts in after pitching and takes the inside edge as Rohit comes forward to defend
132 kph, bowls a fuller delivery on off to which Rohit comes forward and defends to the leg side
137 kph, short of length delivery, bounces extra and the batsman is unable to get it away on the leg side, gets hit high on the thigh pad
comes forward to a length ball outside off and defends to the off side
the bowler pulls the length back, and keeps it in the channel outside off, the batsman defends to the off side off the back foot
short of a length delivery on off, the batsman stays in the crease and opens the face to play it towards point
length ball outside off, Gambhir doesn't come forward or back, plays it towards point

overthrows gives the batsmen two. Samit Patel being the culprit here. The ball was dropped on to the leg side and Samit came in charging and lobbed the ball over the fielder coming from the off side. Unnecessary
short and wide and that is cracked away to the off side, but Bell makes a flying stop at cover to cut-off runs
back of length on off stump, defended to the off side
he gets some room and uses it to his advantage as he crunches this one in the gap at cover point for his second boundary
defended down the pitch by the batsman, but Rohit comes three-quarters down the pitch, is rightfully sent back
length ball on off stump, defended to mid-on by the batsman
length ball outside off, Rohit comes forward and pushes it to cover
short of length delivery, defended back to the bowler on the hop
gets a snorter! Finn always gets that extra bounce and this time he gets some with a short of length delivery on off, it goes past the outside edge
in the channel outside off, the batsman sees that it is away from him, so lets it go
the 'talented' Rohit makes an entry and plays an effortless on-drive to a fuller length delivery on the stumps and much like Cook's fours, it races once past the infield
short of length outside off, Gambhir stays beside the line of the ball and defends it to point
he hops and defends the short of length delivery to the off side

short of length delivery and Gambhir has done what he often does, he wafts outside the off stump without any feet movement and is taken by the keeper. He walks back in frustration, as he didn't really get a bat on that. Second umpiring error of the day.
gets beaten by the first ball. It pitches short of length and straightens past the edge
in the channel outside off, Kohli comes forward and lets it go through
another one in the channel, Kohli leaves it alone
attempts a yorker, but it is comfortably blocked out to the leg side
short of length on off stump, and the batsman leaves it trusting the bounce on the wicket
short of length outside off, defended off the back foot towards point
short of length delivery on the body and he goes for the pull, but doesn't get hold of that shot, it goes over the infield but slows down towards the boundary
back of length on the middle stump line, Kohli stays on the back foot and defends it down the pitch
the bowler keeps it tight just outside off, defended back to the bowler
veers in on the pads but the batsman is unable to get it away as he is hit high on the pads

dropped by KP, almost a wicket! Rohit made room and charged down to the length delivery trying to smash it over extra cover, but toe-ends it to KP at mid-off, who runs back but is not able to time his jump and drops the catch
length ball on the off stump line, defended to the off side
drives it in the air and the ball falls just a meter short of KP at mid-off
length ball on the middle, turned away to midwicket
the batsman comes forward and pushes the length ball towards cover
short of length delivery, on off stump, defended towards the off side off the back foot
in the channel outside off, Rohit doesn't follow the ball and leaves it alone
beats him outside off as the batsman is late to come forward in his defence
stays in the crease and defends the length ball towards point
gets a short ball and he pulls out a cracking pull-shot over the infield again, sends it to the deep square leg boundary
short of length outside off, the batsman opens the face and runs it to the left of point fielder for a single
stays in the crease and pushes the length ball to cover
short of length delivery, cuts in sharply into the batsman and he gets hit on the pads. Bresnan's appeal is turned down as it was going down leg
length ball on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
he keeps it tight on off stump, bowls a short of length delivery which the batsman defends
charges down the wicket and hits the shorter length delivery over wide mid-on for another boundary
length ball on off stump, the batsman defends it to the off side
136 kph, the bowler bowls it on a length outside off, Kohli comes forward in defence
short of length delivery on off, gets it to bounce extra, Kohli defends it off the back foot towards mid-on
extra bounce from the bowler again, Kohli hops and gets behind the ball to drop it down to the leg side
beats him outside off with one that is quick and straightens slightly. Kohli was too late to come forward

the ball drops between the keeper and the fine leg fielder. Finn has his hands on his head. He bowled a quick shorter one and the batsman went for a pull, gets a top-edge and is lucky as the ball falls between the two men.
back of length delivery on off, defended back to the bowler
short and wide first up, Kohli rides the bounce and cuts it hard to the man at deep point
again a bit short and wide of off, the batsman has no problems in cutting that hard to deep  point
the bowler continues to bowl it wide, the batsman this time hits it to the right of deep point
still wide outside off, Rohit tries to cut it but gets an under-edge to the keeper
short and wide and Rohit helps it along by cutting it hard over point for a one-bounce four
bowls it closer to the stumps but Sharma flicks it with soft hands to the gap at midwicket and picks up a couple
flighted delivery on the middle, defended to midwicket
fuller length delivery on off, pushed back to the bowler
goes back to a one he should have gone forward, pushes it back to the bowler
quickly charges down the pitch and hits the bowler over the umpire's head for a boundary
makes room by moving towards leg side and cuts it past point for another couple
drives the flatter delivery down to long-on for another single
length ball with more width, Kohli stays back and finds the gap at deep point with a well-timed hit
he continues to bowl that wide outside off line, Kohli goes back and opens the face to run it down to third-man
over-corrects and fires this one down the leg side. It's called a wide
better delivery from Dernbach as it comes in after pitching just outside off, chopped down towards third man for a single
stays on the back foot and defends this short of length delivery towards point
cuts in from a length outside off, the batsman stays back and cuts it towards point
short, just outside off, allows Kohli to get on top and steer it to third-man
tossed up delivery on off, driven to long-off off the front foot
flighted delivery on the off and middle line, defended to the leg side
pushed through on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
flatter delivery, the batsman goes back and punches it down to long-on
tossed up just outside off, the batsman takes a forward stride and drives it down to long off
flatter delivery on the middle, it takes an inside edge past midwicket as the batsman comes forward to defend
comes in from a length and surprises the batsman who was looking to play it towards point
length ball outside off, the batsman steers it to third-man this time
short of length delivery, comes in with the angle and straightens a bit to take the edge from where the first slip should have been
on the middle stump, flicked away to deep backward square to bring the fifty of the partnership
length ball on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it towards cover
141 kph, it is on the off stump line, the batsman stays behind the line to defend that to off
flatter delivery outside off, punched off the back foot down to long on
86 kph, that is slow and the batsman has to wait for it, defends back to the bowler
quicker now, pushed back to the bowler again
flighted outside off and Rohit sweeps it powerfully to deep midwicket, where Bresnan almost runs ahead and has to dive back to stop the ball

success in the first over for Tredwell! He gets the big wicket of Kohli. That was tossed up on off stump and Kohli drives it softly back to the bowler. It went low to Tredwell who makes no mistake and completes the catch. Kohli walks away disappointed at that shot
flatter delivery on off stump, Yuvraj tries to play it on the on side but gets a leading edge back to the bowler
length ball outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover
short of length delivery on off stump, Yuvraj goes back and flicks it towards midwicket
140 ks, short of length delivery on off, Rohit defends that to the off side with ease
length ball pitches on off stump line, and cuts back into the batsman. He gets hit on the pads
fuller length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid-off
length ball aimed at the off stump, the batsman pushes it to the leg side
flighted delivery on off stump, defended back to the bowler off the front foot
the batsman comes forward and plays it with an open face towards the right of point
stays adjacent to the line of the ball and defends it back to the bowler
flatter delivery on off stump, tests Yuvraj's patience who has to come forward to defend
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman goes back and punches it to long-on
flatter delivery outside off, Rohit stays on the back foot and turns the ball to midwicket
length ball on off stump, Yuvraj wristily drives it to mid-on
short of length delivery on off stump, Yuvraj stands tall and punches it back to the bowler
short of length delivery on the body, Yuvraj hops and turns it to deep square leg for a single
slides down the leg side and Rohit glances that fine, but there is a fielder at fine-leg to cut it off
short of length outside off, steered to third-man off the back foot
tries to pull a not so short ball, and it stays low too. The ball hits the thigh pad and drops down close to the stumps
flighted delivery outside off, Rohit takes a stride forward and scoops it over the vacant short fine area for a boundary
flatter delivery on off stump, pushed to mid-off off the back foot
pushed through on off, the batsman wrists it to midwicket
stays back to this one bowled with flatter trajectory, hit to cover
driven to deep point off the back foot off a flatter delivery
the batsman comes forward to defend this flat delivery on off stump
87 ks, flatter outside the off stump, the batsman comes forward and turns it to the leg side for a single
tossed up on off stump, defended off the front foot
attempts a sweep to a tossed up delivery outside off, but misses it completely and gets hit on the back leg
on the pads, and Rohit plays it softly towards square leg and calls for two
flatter delivery just outside off, turned to midwicket for another single
flighted delivery outside off, defended down the pitch.
pushed through on the middle stump line, turned to square leg
makes room and punches the ball straight to cover
tossed up delivery, driven down the ground to long-on

Tredwell takes out Yuvraj Singh playing the sweep shot!! It was slower, pitches on off and middle, and straightens just a touch to hit Yuvraj in front. The batsman was down very early and the ball arrived much slower beating him on his sweep shot. Tredwell seems to have worked Yuvraj out in the series. Big wicket.
tossed up delivery on off, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
tossed up outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover
flighted delivery on off and middle, defended back to the bowler
he comes forward and defends the tossed up delivery to the off side
flatter delivery on off, Raina drops it softly towards cover and sets off for a tight single. Makes it easily in the end
flighted on the middle, driven easily to deep midwicket
goes back to the flatter delivery, and punches it to long-off off the back foot
he gets to his fifty with a dab to the on side.
tossed up delivery, driven back towards non-striker, Tredwell dives and gets a hand to it.
comes down the pitch and lifts it straight over the bowler's head towards the sight screen for his first six
gets inside the line of the ball and sweeps it over deep backward square leg for a boundary easily
flatter delivery outside off, he stays back and cuts it hard, Finn makes a diving stop to prevent a boundary at short third-man
flatter outside off, the batsman stays back and places it towards point
flatter on the stumps, the batsman tries to steer it towards point, and plays straight to the fielder
flighted delivery on off, the batsman tries to drive on off, but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
flighted on the middle, he sweeps it again through deep backward square for another boundary
stays back in the crease and pushes to ball towards cover to pick up a single
flatter delivery on off, pushed back to the bowler
now Raina sweeps it, in the air, and finds the boundary at deep backward square
tossed up outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives towards cover for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, Raina has to reach out for it as he places it in the gap towards cover, wants a single, but is rightly sent back
flatter delivery on off, he goes back and punches it past the diving bowler to long-off
on the off and middle line, turned away to deep midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, the batsman comes forward and drives it to long-on
a bit short, Rohit goes back and punches it, but is unable to beat the man at extra cover
he finds the gap he was looking for the previous ball. Similar delivery, he goes back and punches it to the left of extra cover, and there is no one in the deep to cut it off
short of length, but on the pads and Raina hops on his toes to glance that to deep backward square for a couple
short ball outside off, doesn't get up too high, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
not so short, but Raina goes for the pull through midwicket anyway, not the hoick as this one goes all along the ground to the deep midwicket boundary
length ball on off, Raina has to come on the front foot to defend
length ball on off and this time he plays it over the infield, doesn't get all the timing, but enough to send the ball rolling to the deep midwicket boundary
length ball on off, Raina shuffles across and works it to deep square leg for a single
flatter delivery on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
goes back to punch a quicker delivery to long off
gets a shorter delivery outside off and he cracks it through point for another boundary
pushed to midwicket off a flatter delivery on the middle
quicker delivery outside off, he stays on the back foot and punches it comfortably to deep cover
flighted delivery on the middle, Raina plays it straight, hits it to long-on for a single
short of length on the pads, Raina hops and glides it to deep backward square leg for a couple
not-so-short ball outside off, but Raina decides to go aerial anyway, doesn't get hold of it as it goes over mid-on , it's pulled back by the fielder in time
short ball on the body, comes off slower from the pitch, Raina waits and pulls it down to fine leg
back of length outside off, pushed to point from the crease
slower delivery from the bowler, but it is pitched too short and gives time to the batsman to watch it and cut it to deep point
he was waiting for this short delivery and places this over midwicket with a hoick for another boundary
tossed up on the pads, turned to midwicket
comes down the pitch, but doesn't get hold of his shot as he ends up playing it towards deep cover instead of extra cover
flatter delivery on the middle stump, the batsman defends it down the pitch
goes back to this quicker one on the stumps and punches it to deep cover
goes for the paddle sweep and manages to play it fine, just enough to beat Samit Patel at deep backward square
quicker on the pads, it is punched to deep midwicket

and it takes on one ball for Finn to make an impact! He bowls it on a length, the ball cuts back into Rohit, who dare I say, was a bit lazy in his defence, gets hit on the knee roll and Steve Davis raises his finger.
he shuffles and glides the short of length ball down to the fine-leg boundary
another loud shout for lbw! Finn bowls it fast and on a length, Dhoni was hit while on the shuffle, but he was outside the line of off.
144 kph, Finn is working up some pace here. He bowls a length and Dhoni is late on it, but manages to play it towards midwicket
144 kph, it is down the leg side and is called a wide
good short ball from Finn, Raina sways outside the line
quick and full on off, the batsman tries to play it on the leg side, but gets a leading edge which goes down to third-man

length ball, Raina pushes it with soft hands to mid-off and sets off immediately, but there is hesitation as he sees that Dhoni stop. He carries on nonetheless, but that would have been tight had the fielder hit
more hesitation, Raina runs almost all the way down to strikers as Dhoni played that towards point where the fielder made a good stop
quicker short of length delivery, hits Dhoni on the body as he tries to shuffle and play that towards off
length ball on off, he shuffles again and defends it on the leg side
comes forwards and pushes the ball through cover for a well-judged couple
short of length outside off, the batsman covers the line of stumps and lets the ball go through to the keeper
length ball on off, defended to the leg side
length ball on off, that comes in a touch into Raina and hits him on the top of the front pad. A loud appeal, but the umpire turns it down
quick short delivery, Raina has to wait for that as it comes a touch slow off the surface, he places that to fine leg
144 kph bouncer just outside off, Dhoni sways out of the line right at the end
some timing by Dhoni! The ball was on a length on off stump, and Dhoni just defended it back to the bowler, or that's what it looked like, but it sped on the surface to go to the boundary
length ball outside off, doesn't bounce as much as some other deliveries, left alone
flighted delivery outside off, driven straight to cover
pushed through on middle and leg, Raina stays back and pushes it to midwicket
tossed up delivery wide outside off, and Raina comes out, gets to the pitch of the ball and drives it through the infield all along the ground

He is beaten by the flight here and misses the line of the ball, he falls over and Buttler has taken the bails off in a flash. It looks very close but looks like he has managed to keep his toe on the ground
flatter delivery on off, punched to deep cover off the back foot
flatter delivery on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
length ball outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover
142 kph, Dhoni shuffles across and dabs the length ball to the leg side for a quick single
short of length outside off, Raina waits and cuts it to deep point off the back foot
shuffles across and defends the length ball to the off side
short of length on the off stump, the batsman shuffles and gets behind the line, turns it to square leg
short of length outside off, the batsman lets it go through to the keeper
short of length delivery outside off, Dhoni goes back and across and turns the ball to the leg side
back of length on the middle, Raina hops and drops it towards square leg. The two batsmen hare back for the second
on the pads, it is flicked away to deep backward square easily
fuller delivery outside off, Raina goes for a drive and edges the ball through the vacant second slip region, gets to his fifty
tries to heave it to the leg side, but doesn't get the timing, goes as far as midwicket
length ball down the leg side, it is called a wide
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman goes on the back foot and cuts it to deep point region for a couple
back of length delivery on the middle, Dhoni gets inside the line and glances the ball to fine leg
waits for the short of length delivery on the back foot and defends it to the off side
back of length and outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
hops on the crease and tries to guide the short of length delivery to the off side, but plays it straight to point
tests the batsman with a fuller delivery on the off stump, Raina stays rooted on the crease but plays it towards the off side with an open face
short ball on the middle stump, the batsman goes back and pulls it to deep square leg for three runs
goes back and across to this short of length delivery outside off, punches it to cover
stays on the back foot to a fuller length delivery outside off and drives to deep cover
on the pads, and Raina flicks it past short fine leg. The fielder runs after the ball but is unable to pull the ball back as he dives
short ball, Raina plays a controlled pull to deep backward square for another couple
short bouncer, goes over the head of the batsman and is called a wide
it is on the leg side and Raina gets some bat on it to glide it to the fine-leg boundary
stays on the back foot and opens the face to run the short of length delivery to point

caught at backward point! the luck has changed for Dernbach and could be this wicket that turns the game! It was short, it was wide, it was asking to be hit and Dhoni smashes it straight to the backward point fielder to add some spice to the game.
gets a fuller length delivery on the middle, he flick-drives it in the air through midwicket for his first runs today
short of length delivery on off, pushed to point off the back foot
another shortish delivery on off, the batsman goes back and defends it to off
gets beaten as he tries to waft at a widish delivery from the crease. He didn't move his feet at all.
gets behind the line this time and defends it to mid-off
bowls it flatter on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
similar delivery, but the batsman goes back and punches it to long on this time
tossed up on off stump, driven back to the bowler
drifting on to the pads, and Jadeja gets hit in front as he tries to play it on the on side
tossed up outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends to cover
plays it off the keeper's gloves almost, not convincingly though, and gets it fine to the boundary
he drops it towards cover and sets off for a quick single, makes it to the other side easily
flatter delivery on off stump, the batsman goes back and turns it to midwicket
pushed through on the pads, it is turned to short fine leg for another single
quicker and fuller on the pads, worked towards short fine leg for a single
flighted down the leg side and Raina looses his balance as he tries to sweep that, rolls on the crease and is not able to take the single
drives the tossed up delivery through cover, but Cook makes a diving stop to keep the batsman to a single
comes down the crease and plays the flighted delivery on the full, drives it to long-off
flatter now, Jadeja plays it with soft hands towards off
flatter delivery outside off, he cuts it but straight to point
waits for the quicker delivery on the back foot and turns it to square leg for a single
floated on off stump, the batsman pushes it to point
drifts down the leg side and Raina gets bat on it to run it past the short fine leg fielder for another boundary
tossed up on the middle, pushed to midwicket
flatter delivery, cut off the back foot towards point
comes forward to this floated delivery, punches it to long-off
tossed up on the middle and leg, Jadeja plays a well-placed sweep through to the deep backward square leg boundary
flatter outside off, but Jadeja goes back and turns it to deep midwicket for a single
floated outside off, Raina comes forward and drives it to long-off
beats the batsman with a widish delivery outside off as Raina tries to reach for it
short of length on the off and middle line, defended off the back foot to the leg side
length ball and he just lifts it over the infield, straight over the the bowler's head and it clears the boundary rope
bowls on a length on the leg stump, it is flicked to fine leg for a single
short ball to test Jadeja, and it almost does the job as he plays a hurried pull towards deep backward square leg
length delivery wide of off, Raina goes back and tries to steer it to off, plays it straight to point
short ball to Jadeja, but it doesn't bounce much as it is a touch slower in pace. It arrives after Jadeja is through with his shot
gets another short ball at a comfortable height, pulls it to deep square leg
it is on the leg side, on  a length, Raina glances it down to fine leg
141 ks, quick short of length delivery that angles across the left-hander, beats him outside off as Jadeja tries to defend
on the middle stump line, flicked away off the hip to fine leg
fuller length delivery on the middle, and another one is flicked down to behind square on the leg side
length ball, he moves his front foot out and drives it over the infield at cover, doesn't get hold of it completely and the ball is pulled back by deep cover
tries to heave it towards the leg side, but it's stopped by the midwicket fielder. Jadeja sends Raina back and Raina does vice-versa
length ball on the off side, pushed to cover
short of length delivery on off, Raina gets beside the line of the ball and guides it straight to point
short ball on the body, Raina plays an ill-controlled pulled towards deep square leg.
length ball, pushed to the gap at cover for a single
short of length outside off, defended off the back foot
length delivery on the middle and off, pushed to mid-on from the crease
on the middle and leg, Jadeja goes on the back foot and flicks it towards the vacant deep midwicket region to run three and complete a comfortable win
